title: Spacious Studio Apartment! ASAP Move Top Floor Sundeck!
map_address: 3838 N Broadway near N Sheffield Ave
posting_body: ['This apartment comes with beautiful hardwood flooring, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, remote control AC/Heat, complimentary wired fiber internet, built-in dishwasher, refrigerator, and microwave.', 'Located just a two blocks from Wrigley Field, you will find tons of nice restaurants, shops, and tons of nightlife opportunities.', 'Trash removal and water utilities included in rent.', 'NEARBY LOCATIONS', '&', 'gt; Sheridan Red line station, Sheridan & Irving Park X9, 80, and 151 buses, Broadway & Irving Park 36 and 80 buses', '&', 'gt; Whole Foods, Jewel Osco, Target, Walgreens', '&', 'gt; Planet Fitness, FFC', '&', 'gt; Montrose Beach, Thorek Memorial Hospital, Wrigley Field', 'BUILDING FEATURES', '&', 'gt;', 'Fitness center', '&', 'gt;', 'Top floor sundeck', '&', 'gt;', 'Secure bike storage', '&', 'gt; Secure access entry', '&', 'gt; Elevator', '&', 'gt;', 'Laundry room', '&', 'gt; 24 hour maintenance engineers', '&', 'gt; Complimentary wired fiber internet', '&', 'gt;', 'Pet cat friendly', '&', 'gt;', 'Leasing/Management office', 'Please Contact for more information', 'Caiden Purcell', 'BJB Properties Inc.', '224-500-7624', 'Email, Call, or Text', 'Equal Housing Opportunity', 'Pictures are for marketing purposes and may not represent the exact unit available', 'Prices subject to change']
